title: ICE "unexpected predicate" with trait_alias

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(trait_alias)] use std::ops::{Deref, DerefMut}; trait DoubleDerefMut = DerefMut where ::Target: DerefMut; fn _f() -> impl DoubleDerefMut { Box::new(Box::new(0)) } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.49.0-nightly (a1dfd2490 2020-10-05) binary: rustc commit-hash: a1dfd2490a6cb456b92e469fa550dc217e20ad6d commit-date: 2020-10-05 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.49.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling rust25 v0.1.0 (/home/carado/tmp/rust25) Running `rustc --crate-name rust25 --edition=2018 src/lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=dcd7e8409bf485cf -C extra-filename=-dcd7e8409bf485cf --out-dir /home/carado/tmp/rust25/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/home/carado/tmp/rust25/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/home/carado/tmp/rust25/target/debug/deps` warning: Error finalizing incremental compilation session directory `/home/carado/tmp/rust25/target/debug/incremental/rust25-3xbehoyywx89/s-frvbjon4zu-zltv7r-working`: No such file or directory (os error 2) warning: 1 warning emitted error: internal compiler error: unexpected predicate ProjectionPredicate(ProjectionTy { substs: [ as std::ops::Deref>::Target], item_def_id: DefId(2:2234 ~ core[5bc6]::ops::deref::Deref::Target) }, u32) on opaque type --> src/lib.rs:6:36 | 6 | ::Target: DerefMut; | ^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_ty/src/ty.rs:602:18 error: internal compiler error: unexpected predicate TraitPredicate(< as std::ops::Deref>::Target as std::ops::DerefMut>) on opaque type --> src/lib.rs:6:27 | 6 | ::Target: DerefMut; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_ty/src/ty.rs:602:18 error: internal compiler error: unexpected predicate TraitPredicate(< as std::ops::Deref>::Target as std::ops::Deref>) on opaque type --> /home/carado/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/ops/deref.rs:167:21 | 167 | pub trait DerefMut: Deref { | ^^^^^ | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_ty/src/ty.rs:602:18 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:961:13 ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/a1dfd2490a6cb456b92e469fa550dc217e20ad6d/library/std/src/panicking.rs:483 1: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt at /rustc/a1dfd2490a6cb456b92e469fa550dc217e20ad6d/library/std/src/panicking.rs:437 2: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::flush_delayed 3: ::drop 4: core::ptr::drop_in_place 5: as core::ops::drop::Drop>::drop 6: core::ptr::drop_in_place 7: rustc_span::with_source_map 8: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 9: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.49.0-nightly (a1dfd2490 2020-10-05) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `rust25` Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name rust25 --edition=2018 src/lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=dcd7e8409bf485cf -C extra-filename=-dcd7e8409bf485cf --out-dir /home/carado/tmp/rust25/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/home/carado/tmp/rust25/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/home/carado/tmp/rust25/target/debug/deps` (exit code: 101) ```
